title: Emerging investigator series: quantitative insights into the relationship between the concentrations and SERS intensities of neonicotinoids in water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00221K, Communication
Shengdong Liu, James Lazarcik, Haoran Wei
This study explores the theoretical foundation behind the application of surface-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) for neonicotinoid quantification.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
